name: Road Defence
description:
Money. The currency is roads. You can buy towers with roads and you can earn roads with toll towers or damaging enemy cars.  If the enemy cars get past your defences then you lose roads. You lose the game when you run out of roads.

Traffic Light Tower: This tower damages enemy cars.

    Speed Camera Tower: This tower slows down enemy cars.

   Toll Tower: This tower gives you roads each wave.

  • Start wave: S
  • Build tower: Left click on icon.
